text: @SarahKSilverman Sarah: #bernie We will join in hunger strikes with the Prison Population wrt to Covid-19 as they see fit. +Please help us trend for a general Labor strike on 4/15 for all service workers #generalstrike #serviceworkers #april15 #allday #restaurants #grocerystores

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
